page.title: 07TRADE
page.content: { FERNHILL CATTERY {SITUATION - FERNHILL COTTAGES, {ROUNCIL LANE, KENILWORTH. THE CATTERY IS OWNED BY{MRS.JENNY {PICKERING.}IT WAS ESTABLISHED IN 1981 ALTHOUGH MRS.PICKERING HAS OCCUPIED THE PREMISES SINCE 1980. THE COST FOR BOARDING A CAT IS Â£1.50 PER DAY, SHE CAN TAKE UP TO 22 CATS AT ANY ONE TIME. CATS ARE USUALLY BOARDED BY PEOPLE WHO ARE GOING ON HOLIDAY OR WHO ARE MOVING HOUSE. THE CATS ARE WELL CARED FOR, THEY ARE FED ON WHISKERS CAT FOOD, THEY DRINK WATER AND GOATS MILK, THEY ARE BRUSHED MORNING AND NIGHT AND THEIR CAGES ARE KEPT VERY CLEAN. A WIDE VARIETY OF BREEDS ARE BOARDED AT THE CATTERY, THE MOST COMMON BEING 'BLACK MOGGIES'.
